title: Dear Lee Sin Mains
body:
I've lost 5/20 games and in 3 of those games I've had a Lee Sin who anchor'd the team. Now this isn't salty or whinging but I'd like to be constructive here. If you play Lee Sin please understand that your champion is limited. Your early game rocks and you can snowball lanes heavily. You don't do that when you take all the kills. What ends up happening is that you take all the kills go 7-0-0 early then come mid game you're 7-6-2. 

If you snowball early build semi tank so you can at least survive enough to feed more kills to your comrades. Please don't think you are invincible with your lead and proceed to feed. This isn't all Lee Sins but evidence shows that 3/5 losses is because of a Lee Sin and that's some serious statistics there. 

P.S. This is semi sarcastic but also semi serious. Take it with some sugar coated salt. 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
I know exactly what you mean because I am one of these said anchors.
I've played Lee Sin a lot, but man, I play so horribly with him, but I keep trying because he's so fun.

Sorry to anyone I've ever burdened with my trash Lee Sin.
